title: S12 Ep75: ABLAZE! The Mysterious Fires of Spontaneous Human Combustion
itunes:title: ABLAZE! The Mysterious Fires of Spontaneous Human Combustion
description:
There is overwhelming evidence that Spontaneous Human Combustion has occurred for centuries, with no rational explanation to satisfy REAL science.
These are some of the most confounding cases and the unbelievable response for the science community. Larry Arnold has over 3 decades of research into this astonishing phenomena.

Larry Arnold: http://www.parascience.com/
